actionCalls.description: Add error log if there are issues getting the Custom Metadata
actionCalls.name: Add_Error_Log
actionCalls.label: Add Error Log

assignments.description: Assign the Start Date Time of the Event to a text variable.
assignments.name: Assign_Start_Date_Time
assignments.label: Assign Start Date Time

decisions.description: When Metadata is TRUE - use the new scheduling automation When Metadata is FALSE - use original functionality, no dark functionality
decisions.name: Check_Feature_Flag_Config
decisions.label: Check Feature Flag Config

Flow.description: A flow for Modify appointment that will let the MSA choose between keeping the same provider or looking for the next available appointment time. If the same provider is selected, the flow redirects to a subflow. 1.18.0 - Feature CCCM-38380 - Generate VVS Link for Video Appointment with feature flag 1.17.0 - CCCM-40923 - Refactor to use Custom Metadata feature flags for dark functionality 1.16.0 - adding overlapping booking error 1.15.0 - added sub flow at the end to Create and redirect to new Progress Note.

formulas.description: The naming convention for the Event's Subject field.
formulas.name: eventTitle

formulas.description: When VVS feature flag is true and user checks Generate Video Link checkbox on screen, it will be the URL returned from the callout When VVS feature flag is false or user does not check video link checkbox, it will be the field value from user input. Generate Video Link checkbox is only displayed when feature flag is True.
formulas.name: formula_VVS_Field_Value

formulas.description: Format start time in UTC for the VVS link callout
formulas.name: formulaStartTimeUTC

formulas.description: Represents a date/time an hour after the scheduled start of the selected time slot
formulas.name: oneHourAfterStartTime

formulas.description: Represents a date/time an hour before the scheduled start of the selected time slot
formulas.name: oneHourBeforeStartTime

Flow.label: VCC Modify Appointment

recordLookups.description: Get the Service Resource record of the Medical Provider. Used to display name and get email from the related User record.
recordLookups.name: getMPServiceResource
recordLookups.label: getMPServiceResource

recordLookups.description: Get the Person Account record that is linked to the Service Appointment.
recordLookups.name: getPersonAccount
recordLookups.label: getPersonAccount

recordLookups.description: Query the event related to the Service Appointment
recordLookups.name: getRelatedEvent
recordLookups.label: getRelatedEvent

recordLookups.description: Get the Service Territory linked to the Service Appointment. Naming convention for Service Territory is "VISN #", so the ServiceTerritory.Name would be "VISN 8" for example.
recordLookups.name: getVISNName
recordLookups.label: getVISNName

recordLookups.description: Get the Appointment Template (aka WorkType) for the Service Appointment. Note that Appointment Template is the label for the standard object, but WorkType is the API Name.
recordLookups.name: getWorkType
recordLookups.label: getWorkType

recordUpdates.description: Reset the Event Subject to the correct naming convention
recordUpdates.name: updateEventSubject
recordUpdates.label: updateEventSubject

fields.name: Modifyappointment
fields.fieldText: Selecting next available time will not guarantee the same provider.

validationRule.errorMessage: You must verify the patient's contact information for this VCV appointment

fields.name: displayText_OverlapError
fields.fieldText: ERROR: VCV Appointment cannot be scheduled for patient within an hour of a previously scheduled VCV appointment. Please select another time.

subflows.description: Do callout to get VVS URL, error logging and fault path is included in subflow.
subflows.name: Generate_Video_Link_Apex
subflows.label: Generate Video Link

variables.description: Specify a default time zone for Lightning Scheduler appointments.
variables.name: DefaultTimeZone

variables.description: variable to hold values of distance units
variables.name: distanceUnit

variables.description: The Start Date Time of the related Event.
variables.name: eventStartDateTime

variables.description: Specify a comma-separated list of service resource IDs. Depending on the page, these IDs are used to filter work type groups, service territories, or service resources.
variables.name: FilterByResourceIds

variables.description: Specify whether to display ST OH or not
variables.name: hideStOh

variables.description: Stores the API name of the scheduling policy you want to associate with the flow.
variables.name: SchedulingPolicyName
